DOC.brief_title: Single-center Randomized Trial Comparison Performance Between Domestic Imported Chemoport
DOC.detailed_description: chemoport implantation do two investigator Chemoport type randomly render . Domestic chemoport ( Human port ) import chemoport ( Celsite ) use . chemoport function follow .
DOC.criteria: patient receive chemotherapy via implantable port age > 20 year expect life time > 6 month lab test ( platelet > 50K , PT INR < 2.0 ) performance status > 2 brain metastasis expect life time le 6 month age less 20 year active infection severe heart dysfunction recent myocardial infarct
